function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Pathogen contamination in the hospital environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna on hospital surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support from who in 2003","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of community acceptance of self-quarantine measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of uncontrolled mass travel during holidays","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate case identification, containment, and resource allocation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficult decisions under uncertainty and time constraints","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear health messaging","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time public communications mostly in mandarin chinese and sign language, limited communication in different languages for non-taiwanese citizens","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Permitting the docking of the diamond princess cruise ship with confirmed infections onboard, leading to public panic and concern about community spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the sustainability of intensive public health policies and public reception until the end of the epidemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and lack of education on contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hoarding masks and medical supplies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate support for schools, businesses, and furloughed workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of border control and case identification leading to unmonitored spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misallocation of resources leading to inadequate supply of essential medical equipment like masks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation leading to public anxiety and confusion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proactive case finding and retesting for covid 19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overloading of the hotline system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disease stigma and compassion for affected individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to mainland china and high number of flights increase the risk of covid-19 transmission to taiwan.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Constant alert and readiness to act on epidemics arising from china since the 2003 sars epidemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health declaration border pass and mobile phone tracking for immigration clearance and quarantine enforcement.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High requirement of technical personnel and high costs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Residual disinfectants after disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relative narrow disinfection spectrum and complex impact factors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious and pathological wastes leading to disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection methods leading to incomplete destruction of toxic components","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper training and expertise in handling advanced disinfection technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of contaminated wastewater and sludge as agricultural fertilizer","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of qualified personnel for waste management and disposal","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of chlorine disinfection in hospital wastewater may result in chlorine-resistant pathogens.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of infectious waste may lead to the spread of the sars-cov-2 virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes may lead to the persistence of infectious materials.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited studies on sars-cov-2 inactivation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged survival of sars viruses in hospital wastewater and waste","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable efficiency of ozone disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through contaminated hospital waste and wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate studies on the inactivation of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of pharmaceutical wastes at sanitary landfills","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discharge of chemical wastes into the drainage system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper handling and disposal of radioactive wastes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious wastes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of disposable medical supplies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disposal of pharmaceutical wastes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High temperature incineration may generate hazardous substances like dioxins during low temperature combustion","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mixing non-hazardous wastes with hazardous or infectious pollutants may require special disposal and disinfection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Different disinfection and disposal methods should be adopted based on unique characteristics of different hospital wastes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of new disinfection technologies may lead to improper implementation and potential errors in operation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
